page.title: 17INDUSTRY IN HOLYBOURNE
page.content: When we visited Holybourne we were shown round the Watson and Haig site, where {agricultural machinery} is repaired and resold. The machines range from tractors to fork lifts. We saw large and small tractors, plough and other attachments for tractors, combine harvesters and a 'giraffe' for silage making. We were shown all round the site and allowed to climb up on some of the tractors. We watched machinery being repaired in the workshop and we were shown the store of {spare parts} they have to keep. They have an {office} attached to the workshop and a computer to help with their administration.
